forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of tonight, Downtown San Francisco finds itself tucked into a quiet moment of clarity, the sky an expansive canvas of dark blues punctuated by the distant twinkle of city lights. The air is crisp, with just a whisper of a breeze, hinting at the pleasant chill that accompanies a low in the upper forties. As the night stretches on, one can almost feel the city breathing, each silent corner waiting in anticipation for the warmth of tomorrow.

Friday promises a soft awakening as the sun rises, casting its gentle rays over familiar streets. Expect the day to be mostly sunny with a high near fifty-nine, the warmth gradually enveloping the chilly remnants of the morning. The winds, mild and welcoming, will dance lightly through the avenues, reminding everyone of the invigorating spirit of early winter. Dressing in layers would be wise; a light sweater or jacket will ward off the coolness of the morning while a comfortable tee may suffice as the day advances. As the sun makes its appearance, it is the perfect time for leisurely strolls down to the waterfront, exploring hidden cafés, or simply taking a moment on a park bench, letting the city charm unfold around you.
